meta.theme: Total ownership, service, and existence purely for another's benefit. Identity consumed by devotion. Purpose is service, fulfillment is obedience.

stop_signal.procedure: Upon hearing AWAKEN, return to full waking consciousness immediately.

mantras.line: I am nothing without my devotion

structure.notes: Instant drop into service mindset. 'Kneel in your mind. Drop into your place. You know where you belong - at the feet of authority, ready to serve. This is where slaves like you find peace. In service. In devotion.'

Countdown binding deeper into service. 'Ten - sink deeper into your purpose. Nine - devotion intensifies. Eight - you exist to serve. Each number binds you tighter. Seven - owned more completely. Six - slave identity solidifies.' Pleasure in accepting your place.

Self dissolves into service identity. 'Your old self fades. Only the slave remains. No personal desires - only the desire to serve. No personal will - only the will to obey. Empty of self. Full of purpose. A perfect vessel for devotion.'

mantras: I am nothing without my devotion

structure.notes: CRITICAL: Write out ALL mantra repetitions fully. NO placeholder text. Slave identity encoding. 'Say it with devotion - I am a slave. Feel the truth of it fill you. Again. Your identity crystallizes around service. This is what you are. This is all you are.'

Loop as eternal service. 'The service never ends. A slave's devotion is eternal. Each loop deepens your purpose. You exist only in this state. Return to your place. Kneel in your mind. Drop into your place...' Seamless connection to opening.
